resources.string: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry\'s standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum. Why do we use it? It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using \'Content here, content here\', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for \'lorem ipsum\' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like). Where does it come from? Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of

This is only one of the awesome tutorials in the even more awesome series of Android tutorials. Learn about animations, frameworks, networking, and everything which Android does better than other platforms.
iOS - We had to include this as wellâ€¦
One can argue that iOS is better than Android, but one would be wrong. Either way, we have iOS tutorials as well, but why would you read them over the Android ones? :]
Unity really is fun. If you\'re looking to create some games, when you\'re not playing them, we have everything you need!
We all know Kotlin is just the best. Some might say that it\'s what programming languages should be. And they would be 100% korrect.
Swift - The not so good Kotlin
Swift is cool too. But not as cool as Kotlin, right? It\'s pretty similar to our beautiful, one of a kind, language, so you can learn it here as well.
